mainSequence.step: HydratorUser selects the option to create a new pipeline
Web UI displays the pipeline creation form
HydratorUser fills in pipeline details and specifies a new dataset instance
Web UI initiates pipeline and dataset creation
Dataset Management Service verifies dataset type and version
Version Control provides dataset type specifications
Dataset Management Service confirms dataset type
Pipeline requests creation of new dataset instance
Dataset Instance Creator creates a new dataset instance
Dataset Management Service registers new dataset instance version
Dataset Instance Creator confirms dataset instance creation
Pipeline displays success message and pipeline details on Web UI
